title: MEAS MECH_ENG 466-0-1 Inelastic Constitutive  Relations for Solids

instructors.instructor_addr: Technological Institute, Rm A333, 2145 Sheridan Rd, EV CAMPUS

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Introduction to the formulation and implementation of inelastic constitutive relations for solids. Viscoelasticity, rate-independent plasticity, viscoplasticity. State variable descriptions and thermodynamic restrictions.

subject: MECH_ENG
